changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality enhancements, payment system improvements, and UI/UX refinements across multiple product lines (Factor, Good Chop, TPT). Major work includes multi-cadence support, payment method updates, price migration to whitelabel libraries, and TypeScript migrations.

features.name: OTP Address Persistence
features.description: Added hook to persist OTP addresses for one-time purchase users

features.name: VMS OTP Order Placement
features.description: Implemented hooks for placing VMS one-time purchase orders with systemCountry support in cart and order

features.name: Payment Method Update Drawer
features.description: Created new drawer interface for updating payment methods

features.name: Multi-Cadence Support
features.description: Added observability traces, UI fixes, and GTM events for multi-cadence functionality

features.name: Recipe Product Pages Improvement
features.description: Enhanced recipe product pages for TPT

features.name: Free Addon Banner and Dropdown
features.description: Updated styling for free-addon banner and dropdown components

features.name: Breed-Specific Messaging
features.description: Display custom messages for top breeds and default message for other breeds

features.name: Future Weeks Override for Cart Pricing
features.description: Enabled future weeks override for /cart price request in TPT

decisions.what: Skip PCS call for OTP users
decisions.rationale: Optimization for one-time purchase users who don't need subscription-related PCS calls

decisions.what: Remove unified payments feature flag for Good Chop
decisions.rationale: Feature is stable and ready for full rollout without flag
Standardize price handling across brands in reactivation plan summary and premium shipping

decisions.what: Block alternative flow for OTP in Factor Form
decisions.rationale: Prevent OTP users from accessing subscription-specific flows
Improve type safety and code maintainability

refactors.reason: TypeScript migration for better type safety

refactors.impact: Reactivation plan summary and premium shipping components

refactors.reason: Update tests to reflect current functionality

fixes.issue: Checkout with order confirmation test failure
Missing reschedule order tooltip on cancellation page

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Unified payments feature flag removal, free-addon styling, checkout test fixes

entities.name: Factor
entities.context: OTP flow blocking, reschedule tooltip fix, multi-cadence support

entities.name: TPT (The Pet Table)
entities.context: Recipe pages improvement, breed messaging, notifications TypeScript migration, future weeks pricing

entities.name: VMS (Variety Meal Service)
entities.context: OTP order placement hooks, systemCountry parameter support

entities.name: PCS
entities.context: Skipped for OTP users to optimize performance

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Added key for storage and preps title

entities.name: Whitelabel Library
entities.context: Price migration for premium shipping and reactivation plans

key_patterns: OTP (One-Time Purchase) vs Subscription flow separation pattern across multiple features
Progressive TypeScript migration strategy for legacy JavaScript modules
Feature flag removal pattern for graduated features (unified payments)
Whitelabel library pattern for cross-brand code sharing and standardization
Hook-based architecture for reusable functionality (usePersistOTPAddresses, VMS OTP hooks)
Observability-first approach with traces and GTM events for new features
Brand-specific customization while maintaining shared infrastructure
Test-driven development with dedicated test updates and fixes
